title: 【14w07a】【Tyson】【最后的疯狂】撒福利的箭，妈妈再也不怕我抢不到福利了
author: tyson
txt_content:
大家好
我是Tyson
我为大家带来
【14w07a】【Tyson】【最后的疯狂】撒福利的箭，妈妈再也不怕我抢不到福利了



效果
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNjczMzIwODky/v.swf



代码复制/testfor @e[type=Arrow,c=1] {inGround:1b}复制代码/execute @e[type=Arrow,c=1] ~ ~ ~ setblock ~0 ~3 ~0 chest 0 replace {Items:[{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:0b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:1b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:2b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:3b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:4b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:5b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:6b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:7b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:8b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:9b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:10b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:11b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:12b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:13b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:14b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:15b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:16b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:17b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:18b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:19b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:20b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:21b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:22b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:23b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:24b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:25b},{id:"minecraft:gold_ingot",Damage:0s,Count:1b,Slot:26b}]}复制代码/execute @e[type=Arrow,c=1] ~ ~ ~ summon FireworksRocketEntity ~0 ~4 ~0 {LifeTime:-1,Life:2,FireworksItem:{id:401s,tag:{Fireworks:{Explosions:[{Type:2b,Flicker:1b,Trail:1b,Colors:[16777215,16711680],FadeColors:[1118481,1114112]}]}}}}复制代码/execute @e[type=Arrow,c=1] ~ ~ ~ setblock ~0 ~3 ~ air 1 destroy复制代码/kill @e[type=Arrow] 复制代码


谢谢大家
下一弹会有更好玩的东西
今晚敬请期待
[groupid=511]Command[/groupid]

replies.author: 审奥不解释
replies.txt_content:
2B与mc的故事 发表于 2014-2-15 13:52
话说好久没有看到申奥了
狩猎开始了！
你将成为我的猎物！
你好，旅行者！
打得不错！
这不是我想要的结果！
抱歉！
我亲自出马！
打得好，我认输！

看看缺了哪个？
